poem:
Title: The Meta Dance of Democracy

In the cosmos of Meta, it seems,
Nick Clegg weaves languid dreams.
No beast of AI slumbers near,
No election threats insincere.
He sees instead, in every byte,
A sentinel in the digital night.
Beyond the screen's luminous haze,
Unseen algorithms sing democracy's praise.
